SELECT *
FROM portal_video
WHERE portal_video.groupId = ?
AND (portal_video.categoryId = ?)
AND ((lower(portal_video.videoName) LIKE ?) OR (lower(portal_video.description) LIKE ?))
ORDER BY portal_video.videoName ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL
FROM portal_video
WHERE portal_video.groupId = ?
AND (portal_video.categoryId = ?)
AND ((lower(portal_video.videoName) LIKE ?) OR (lower(portal_video.description) LIKE ?))
